OrgName.entry: FIRTH PARK COMMUNITY ARTS COLLEGE - ADULT LEARNING PROVISION

Desc.entry: Provides a term-by-term programme of courses/activities for adults, including arts and crafts, English, maths and languages, computers and IT, health and wellbeing, music and dance. Please contact for details of courses.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-4pm (office times), Mon, Tues & Wed evenings (Adult Education Programme)

category.entry: EDUCATION - TRAINING PROVIDERS AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT
